channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/jcesawv

item.title: Don't miss the opportunity to take a Critical Incident Stres
item.description: Don't miss the opportunity to take a Critical Incident Stress Management course designed for Fire, EMS, Law Enforcement, and Chaplains!

item.title: We have openings in our Child and Babysitting Course (CABS)
item.description: We have openings in our Child and Babysitting Course (CABS) for this evening 6p to 8p Free of charge. This course will be at JCESA Station 11 at 419 16th Ave Ranson 25438 Class Room 1

item.title: Water Rescue - August 14th 2024 Jefferson County Emergency
item.description: Water Rescue - August 14th 2024 Jefferson County Emergency Services, Citizens Fire Company, Friendship Fire Company, Bakerton Fire Department-Boat 7 and assistance from Middleway Fire Company and Jefferson County Sheriffâ€™s Office was dispatched to a water rescue- vehicle into the water. Upon arrival the swift water team was able to conduct a search- no occupants found. Thanks to RC Towing for assisting getting the vehicle removed from the water way. This incident allowed the continued partnerships between this county to show what we are able to accomplish.
